title: Joash Geteregechi
text:
My name is Joash Geteregechi. I am an Assistant Professor of mathematics at Ithaca College in Ithaca, New York. I am dedicated to inspiring and empowering students through the beauty and depth of mathematical concepts and how they can be used to solve many real-world problems. With a strong background in academia and a genuine enthusiasm for the subject, I strive to make mathematics accessible, engaging, and meaningful to learners of all levels and backgrounds.


Syracuse University | Syracuse, New York| PhD (Mathematics Education) | Aug 2020
Kenyatta University | Nairobi, Kenya| M.Ed (Mathematics)| Sept 2013
Egerton University | Nakuru, Kenya| B.Ed (Mathematics and Chemistry)| Dec 2008



Assistant Professor of Mathematics | Ithaca College | Aug 2020 - Present
Teaching Assistant (Mathematics) | Syracuse University | Aug 2015 - Aug 2020
High School Teacher (Mathematics) | Nyamauro Secondary School | Sep 2010 - Apr 2015
